text: Lars-Gunnar Björklund (24 February 1937, Stockholm, SwedenLars-Gunnar Björklund är död NT Sport 30 November 2012. - 30 November 2012 in Sankt Matteus Parish, Stockholm, Sweden) was a Swedish radio and TV journalist. He was famous as a sports reporter. He was especially famous for reporting from Vasaloppet and the Ice Hockey World Championships. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Swedish journalists
title: Lars-Gunnar Björklund
